```{r}
library(mdsr)

```


```{r}
terrorism <- read.csv("globalterrorismdb.csv")
econData <- read.csv("WEO_Data copy.csv")

```

```{r}
head(terrorism)

```

```{r}
terrorism %>%
  group_by(country_txt) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))

```

```{r}
terrorism %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = longitude, y = latitude)) +
  geom_point()

```

```{r}
terrorism %>%
  filter(country_txt == "United States") %>%
  filter(longitude < 0) %>%
  filter(nkillus > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = longitude, y = latitude)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = nkillus))

```
